description: Frontend UI for OpenAI connection and AI thumbnail management

userStories.title: Settings page
userStories.description: As a user, I want a settings page to manage my inventory configuration.
acceptanceCriteria: Sections: General, OpenAI Integration, Danger Zone

userStories.title: OpenAI connection UI
userStories.description: As a user, I want to connect my OpenAI API key.
acceptanceCriteria: If not connected: form to enter API key
Test button to validate key before saving
If connected: show last used date, disconnect button
userStories.notes: Never display the actual key after saving

userStories.title: Thumbnail display in item cards
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see AI-generated thumbnails on my items.
acceptanceCriteria: Update ItemCard to show thumbnail_url if available
Fallback to type-based placeholder icon if no thumbnail

userStories.title: Generate/regenerate thumbnail button
userStories.description: As a user, I want to generate or regenerate item thumbnails.
acceptanceCriteria: Add 'Generate Thumbnail' button to item detail view

userStories.title: Thumbnail placeholder icons
userStories.description: As a user, I want placeholder icons when no thumbnail is available.
acceptanceCriteria: Icons for: weapon, armor, potion, scroll, wand, ring, wondrous, misc
Update ItemCard to use appropriate placeholder
userStories.notes: Can use Lucide icons or simple SVGs
